text: Martha Mijares (born 1938) is a retired Mexican film actress.Sicre p.32 She appeared in twenty seven films between 1954 and 1960 including the crime adventure Raffles. ==Selected filmography== * When I Leave (1954) * Raffles (1958) * Where Are Our Children Going? (1958) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Sicre, Jose Gomez. Dolores del Rio. General Secretariat of the Organization of American States, 1970. ==External links== * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican film actresses Category:20th-century Mexican actresses Category:Actresses from Mexico City
title: Martha Mijares
